body_text:
*Note: This example also includes @mythmon 's IdentiSHIELDs feature

Description
Update the site navigation with Recently Viewed sections for recipes/extensions, which contain links to the last ~5 items the user has viewed.
I like the idea of using localStorage to save the last viewed links, as well. That way, if a user closes the tab with their session and re-open the site, they can quickly pick up where they left off.
Goal

Eliminates the need for the user to navigate to and reload the Listing page to switch back to a recipe they were just viewing.
Deter user losing context if they accidentally close their browser/tab.

Level of Effort
Low.
